name: Research and Records
section_name: Learn about Nebraska research and records.

choices.name: Get started with research for your Nebraska ancestors.

hidden.summary:
• Learn successful research strategies for Nebraska ancestors.
  • Record Finder: Use the Record Finder to determine records for Nebraska research.

text:
1. Introduction: Learn about basic Nebraska research strategies.

    ☆ FS—Basic Nebraska Research Tips and Strategies

  2. Follow this research study for Nebraska ancestors, from 1880 to the present.

    ☆ FS—Step-by-Step Nebraska Research, 1880-Present

  3. Watch this video for ideas on Nebraska research.

    ☆ FS—United States Research: Great Plains Region - Nebraska—1:41

  4. Ancestry: Explore resources for Nebraska research on Ancestry.

    ☆ AC—Nebraska Resources
    ☆ AC—Nebraska State Research Guide, 5 pgs.

  5. Record Finder: Use the Nebraska Record Finder to decide on records to search.

    ☆ FS—Nebraska Record Finder

    6. Additional Records
    1. Explore a variety of records on the ☆LDSGenealogy site.
    2. Explore historical photo sites on ☆Ancestor Hunt.
    3. Explore resources for school yearbooks on the ☆Ancestor Hunt site.

    Ethnic
    1. African American: Learn about African Americans in Nebraska in these FamilySearch Wiki articles.

      ☆ FS—Wiki: African American Resources for Nebraska
      ☆ FS—Wiki: Nebraska Minorities

    2. Native American: Learn about American Indians in Nebraska in this FamilySearch Wiki article.

      ☆ FS—Wiki: Indians of Nebraska
Additional Records

1. Explore a variety of records on the ☆LDSGenealogy site.
  2. Explore historical photo sites on ☆Ancestor Hunt.
  3. Explore resources for school yearbooks on the ☆Ancestor Hunt site.
Ethnic

1. African American: Learn about African Americans in Nebraska in these FamilySearch Wiki articles.

    ☆ FS—Wiki: African American Resources for Nebraska
    ☆ FS—Wiki: Nebraska Minorities

  2. Native American: Learn about American Indians in Nebraska in this FamilySearch Wiki article.

    ☆ FS—Wiki: Indians of Nebraska

1. Explore Nebraska historical resources on FamilySearch.

    ☆ FS—Nebraska History

  2. Explore Nebraska history on Wikipedia.

    ☆ History
    ☆ History of Nebraska

  3. Learn about Nebraska history on InfoPlease.com.

    ☆ Nebraska History

name: Archives and Libraries
section_name: Learn about Nebraska archives and libraries.

choices.name: Learn about Nebraska archives and libraries.

hidden.summary:
• Explore statewide and regional collections.
  • Explore books and photos that can be helpful in your research.

hidden.exercises:
• * Good: Using the articles and videos in this Choice, write down key learnings for archives and libraries. Then use the learnings for searches for a U.S. ancestor.
  • * Proficient: Same as above, for two or more ancestors.

text:
1. Learn about Nebraska archives and libraries in these articles.

    ☆ FS—Wiki: Nebraska Archives and Libraries
    ☆ Nebraska State Archives: Wonderful Local Sources for Genealogical Research
  2. Explore the State Archives and Libraries site for Nebraska.
  3. Explore Nebraska State Historical Society site.
  4. Explore the ☆Books We Own site for Nebraska genealogy publications. Volunteers may be available for lookup services.
  5. Search for ☆free online books on Nebraska research on the FamilySearch site.
  6. Photos: Explore historical photo resources on the ☆Ancestor Hunt site.

hidden.summary:
• Explore city and county directories to find Nebraska ancestors.
  • Discover the different types of information in directories, such as streets, churches, historical info, etc.

hidden.exercises:
• * Good: Using the articles and videos in this Choice, write down key learnings for city directories. Then use the learnings for searches for a U.S. ancestor.
  • * Proficient: Same as above, for two or more ancestors.

text:
1. Learn about Nebraska city directories in this FamilySearch Wiki article.

    ☆ FS—Wiki: Nebraska Directories

  2. Sites: Explore Nebraska city directories on the Ancestor Hunt site.
  3. Find out more about city directories in this research guide from Ancestry.

    ☆ AC—Six Things to Find—3 pgs.

  4. Explore Nebraska city directories on the ☆Ancestry site.
  5. Explore Nebraska ☆historical directories by county.
  6. Explore additional links for Nebraska city directories on the ☆LDSGenealogy site.
QUIKLinks

hidden.summary:

  2. Explore links for vital records on the Nebraska Public Health site.

  4. Explore Nebraska birth, marriage, and death records on the ☆AccessGenealogy site.
  5. Explore additional links for Nebraska vital records on the ☆Linkpendium site.

  2. Find links to Nebraska newspapers on the Wikipedia site.

QUIKLinks

choices.name: There are a number of websites with valuable resources for Nebraska research.

text:
1. Explore links in ☆Cyndi's List.
  2. Explore links in ☆Linkpendium.
  3. Explore links in ☆Genealogylinks.net.
  4. Explore links in ☆LDSGenealogy.com.

choices.name: Use the QUIKLinks (lightning bolts) or Nebraska County links (bottom) to quickly search common record collections for Nebraska.

text:
1. In the QUIKLinks, click the link for FamilySearch, Ancestry, Findmypast, or MyHeritage to view the corresponding record collection.
  2. Scroll down near the bottom of this page to see available county records. Click the name of the county for FamilySearch, or A for Ancestry, or L for Linkpendium.

1. In FamilySearch, explore the Nebraska Online Genealogy Records page for a variety of record collections.
  2. In each program (FamilySearch, Ancestry, or Findmypast), explore additional record collections besides the ones listed in QUIKLinks.

name: Get Help
section_name: Get help with your Nebraska research.

choices.name: Use Facebook pages to get answers to your questions.

text:
1. Visit the Nebraska Genealogy Network page on Facebook.
  2. Visit the Nebraska Genealogy page on Facebook.
  3. Visit the Nebraska State Genealogical Society page on Facebook.
  4. Visit the U.S. Midwest Genealogy Research page on Facebook.
  5. See the Genealogy on Facebook list of Facebook groups dedicated to helping with research for Nebraska.

1. Join the RootsChat forum and post questions about Nebraska research.
  2. Explore the Nebraska research mailing lists on Cyndi's List.
  3. Use the ☆Ancestry message boards to read or post questions about Nebraska research.

hidden.exercises: • * Proficient: Make a list of Facebook groups, mailing lists, and genealogy societies of interest, and then join or subscribe to them.

text:
1. Learn about genealogy societies in Nebraska in this FamilySearch Wiki article.

    ☆ FS—Wiki: Nebraska Societies

  2. Explore the Nebraska State Genealogical Society site.
  3. Explore the Nebraska Historical Society site.
  4. Explore Nebraska genealogy society sites on Cyndi's List.
  5. Get help at a family history center in Nebraska.
